channel.title: Arduino on A²R Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Arduino on A²R Lab

item.title: Harvard CS249r: Tiny Machine Learning (TinyML)
item.description: An introductory course on Applied AI at the intersection of Machine Learning and Embedded IoT Devices. We provide background on both topics and then dive into the unique challenges faced at that intersection point with hands-on assignments using TensorFlow, Google Colab, and Arduino.
